references.paper_title: Inference under information constraints III: Local privacy constraints
references.reason: This paper provides foundational results on locally private distributed inference, which are directly extended to the multinomial setting in this work.

references.paper_title: Distributed signal detection under communication constraints
references.reason: This paper establishes minimax rates for distributed hypothesis testing under communication constraints, offering a comparison point for the discrete case studied here.

references.paper_title: Federated nonparametric hypothesis testing with differential privacy constraints: Optimal rates and adaptive tests
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant because it provides matching upper and lower bounds for distributed testing under differential privacy in the multivariate Gaussian model, which is used for comparison in the present work.

references.paper_title: Distributed adaptive Gaussian mean estimation with unknown variance: Interactive protocol helps adaptation
references.reason: This paper shows how interactive protocols can improve adaptive estimation in the Gaussian setting, relevant for understanding potential improvements in interactive testing.

references.paper_title: Deficiency distance between multinomial and multivariate normal experiments
references.reason: This paper proves the asymptotic equivalence between the multinomial and Gaussian models, which is the cornerstone of the proof technique used in this work.
